definition: Guo "Terry" Taiming (1950-), prominent Taiwanese businessman, founder of Foxconn

sentences.english: Last week, Mr Gou himself rushed to Shenzhen to address the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 上周，郭台铭亲赴深圳处理危机。

sentences.english: Gou exhibits severity and kindness in the extreme.
sentences.chinese: 郭台铭展示了他极端严厉和仁慈的个性。

sentences.english: Mr. Gou angrily dismisses the critical coverage.
sentences.chinese: 郭台铭愤然否认了那些批评报导。

sentences.english: "We don't want to still be running cafeterias," says Gou.
sentences.chinese: “我们不想再继续开自助餐厅了”，郭台铭说。

sentences.english: The suicides and how to stop them mystify Gou.
sentences.chinese: 自杀事件以及如何阻止自杀让郭台铭困惑不已。

sentences.english: Gou says he's proud of what he's accomplished at Longhua.
sentences.chinese: 郭台铭说他为自己在龙华的成就感到自豪。

sentences.english: At the company's Chinese New Year party, Gou holds a raffle.
sentences.chinese: 在公司新春年会上，郭台铭设置了抽奖节目。

sentences.english: Gou also makes a show of rewarding his employees.
sentences.chinese: 郭台铭也会给他的雇员优厚的奖励。

sentences.english: When it comes to competitors, Gou fiercely guards his turf.
sentences.chinese: 当谈到竞争对手时，郭台铭誓死捍卫自己的领地。

definition: Foxconn Technology Group/abbr. of 富士康科技集團|富士康科技集团[Fu4 shi4 kang1 ke1 ji4 ji2 tuan2]
Hon Hai Precision Industry Company, Taiwan technology company, aka Foxconn

pinyin: Fu4 shi4 kang1 Ke1 ji4 Ji2 tuan2

definition: Jobs (name)/see also 史蒂夫·喬布斯|史蒂夫·乔布斯[Shi3 di4 fu1 · Qiao2 bu4 si1], Steve Jobs
Ma Huateng aka Pony Ma (1971-), Chinese business magnate, CEO of Tencent
Sir Li Ka-shing (1928-), Hong Kong businessman
Steve Jobs (1955-2011), US co-founder and CEO of Apple, Inc.
pinyin: Shi3 di4 fu1 · Qiao2 bu4 si1

definition: Kai-Fu Lee (1961-), Taiwanese computer scientist and IT executive, founding president of Google China 2005-2009
Elon Musk (1971-), business magnate and co-founder of Tesla Motors
Elon Musk (1971-), founder and CEO of SpaceX, co-founder and CEO of Tesla Motors
Ding Lei (1971-), founder and CEO of NetEase 網易|网易[Wang3 yi4]
